about_the_game:
"Debauched Memories" is a non-linear romance visual novel and a sequel of "Stolen Memories"

Story

Slava, after a year of relentless self-improvement, conquers the challenges to step foot into the prestigious university, while Alya loses her passion for education, burdened by her father's expectations. His step-mom Masha, finally liberated from debt, finds herself at a crossroads. No longer tied to the office, she searches for meaning in her newfound freedom. But when Lily, Alya's younger sister, appears and insists on bringing her sibling back, everything takes a turn for the worse.




This touching story of finding the way back to yourself won’t leave you indifferent.


"Debauched Memories" contains a lot of animated CGs, a choice-based story with 3 endings. Game length is 4-5 hours. All sprites and CGs have lip-sync, breathing, physics and tons of expressions. Also, the game has a unique neo-classical OSTs. All characters are 18+ years old - Alya and Lily are a second- and first-year university students, Masha is retired business lady.

content_descriptors.notes: Game has lewd jokes, moans, forehead/cheeks kisses and patting the head.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 9 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Xeon® E5-2640
  • Memory: 250 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 21
  • Processor: Ryzen 2500
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Xeon® E5-2640
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11 or higher
  • Processor: Ryzen 2500
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: Debauched Memories

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Xeon® E5-2640
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ASUS Xonar SE
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Ryzen 2500
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: UNIVERSAL AUDIO Apollo x16

short_description: The emptiness of the chosen path entangles souls, preventing them from moving forward. The quiet, unbearably gentle withering continues, and only hope can stop it. Only hope can bring the smile to her face once more. "Debauched Memories" is a non-linear visual novel with multiple endings.
